author: @MohistVeteran
content: Mohist's Forge compatibility is really strong, 1.20.1 mods basically run perfectly! 👍

author: @RedstoneEngineer
content: TPS is much more stable after using Mohist to host the server, recommended for server owners to try 💻

author: @ModConflictVictim
content: Finally found a solution to run both Thermal series and Ice and Fire simultaneously 😭 Mohist saved my life!

author: @ServerOwnerTony
content: Mohist's plugin support is amazing, now I can use Essentials+WorldEdit to manage mod servers ✨

author: @JavaTuningExpert
content: Recommend allocating at least 6G RAM to Mohist, significant performance improvement for large modpacks ⚡

author: @1.7.10Nostalgia
content: Hope Mohist can support classic 1.7.10 version! So many old mods worth revisiting 🌙

author: @CrashLogAnalyst
content: When encountering NullPointerException, remember to update Java version, Mohist has better compatibility with Java17 🐛

author: @CrossVersionMessenger
content: When will 1.21.1 support be available? Want to play new versions but can't give up old mods 😫

author: @TechDocContributor
content: Issues on GitHub are replied quickly, the developer team is really dedicated ❤️
